resources.string: Are you a super-fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe? Jump into their world with the most difficult/fun Avengers Trivia this side of Asgard!
1. Who was assigned by Nick Fury to specifically monitor the cosmic cube, a.k.a Tesseract before Loki\'s arrival on Earth?
2. What language(s) is Black Widow fluent in?
3. How many dimensions are there in Dr. Strange?
4. Which of these is NOT the name of one of the "Heroes Three" of Asgard?
